Class BodyBuilder

java.lang.Object
us.stomberg.solarsystemsim.physics.BodyBuilder
public class BodyBuilder extends Object
A builder class for creating instances of the Body class. This class uses the builder design pattern to allow for a step-by-step configuration of the Body's attributes before creating the object.

    • position

      public BodyBuilder position(Vector3D pos)
      Sets the position vector for the body.
      Parameters:
      pos - The position vector to use; if null, the default position is retained
      Returns:
      This builder instance for method chaining

    • velocity

      Sets the velocity vector for the body.
      Parameters:
      vel - The velocity vector to use; if null, the default velocity is retained
      Returns:
      This builder instance for method chaining

    • mass

      public BodyBuilder mass(Double mass)
      Sets the mass for the body. Mass must be positive.
      Parameters:
      mass - The mass to use in kg; if null or non-positive, the default mass is retained
      Returns:
      This builder instance for method chaining

    • density

      public BodyBuilder density(Double density)
      Sets the density for the body. Density must be positive. Density is used to calculate the body's radius based on its mass.
      Parameters:
      density - The density to use in kg/mÂ³; if null or non-positive, the default density is retained
      Returns:
      This builder instance for method chaining

    • name

      public BodyBuilder name(String name)
      Sets the name for the body.
      Parameters:
      name - The name to use; if null, a the default name is retained
      Returns:
      This builder instance for method chaining

    • color

      public BodyBuilder color(Color c)
      Sets the color for rendering the body.
      Parameters:
      c - The color to use; if null, the default color (white) is retained
      Returns:
      This builder instance for method chaining

    • build

      public Body build()
      Builds a new Body instance with the configured properties. If no parameters were specified, null is returned. This builder can only be used once; subsequent calls will return null.
      Returns:
      A new Body instance, or null if the builder was already used or no parameters were specified
